TEXT.TITLE: SUNGARD DATA <SNDT> SHARE OFFERING STARTS
TEXT.BODY: SunGard Data Systems Inc said an offering of 1,200,000 common shares is underway at 18.25 dlrs each through underwriters led by Alex. Brown and Sons Inc <ABSB> and L.F. Rothschild, Unterberg, Towbin Inc <R>. Reuter
